      • checkIsTank

        public boolean checkIsTank(char c)
        Check if the item is a tank. Use regular expressions to match when the value is '0' - '9' or a letter, excluding 'X' and 'T'.
        参数:
        c - The name of the item
        返回:
        True if the item is a tank, false otherwise

      • makeDamage

        public void makeDamage(Projectiles p)
        Method to calculate damage caused by projectiles and tank self-destruction.

        1. If a tank is hit by an explosion, it will suffer damage. The damage is determined by the proximity to the explosion center. Overall, the damage follows the formula y=-2x+60; 2. If the explosion hits a mountain peak, it will affect the mountain's height. If the mountain is lowered due to the explosion, - Plants: They will fall straight down but still remain on the slope. - Tanks: Record the target location of the fall and gradually fall frame by frame. Damage is calculated only when it reaches the bottom. If a parachute is available, it will be automatically used to slow the fall and avoid damage.

        参数:
        p - The projectile causing the explosion

      • changeLevel

        public void changeLevel(int level)
        Method to change the current level.

        Only effective when the value is valid, otherwise no action is taken.

        参数:
        level - The new level to change to

      • setNewLevelConfig

        public void setNewLevelConfig()
        Method to read new level configurations.

        Includes terrain, tank positions, trees, and resetting related attributes.

      • sortScore

        public void sortScore()
        Utility method to sort a HashMap by value.
